name: Soreyuke Ebisumaru! Karakuri Meiro: Kieta Goemon no Nazo!!
name_original: Soreyuke Ebisumaru! Karakuri Meiro: Kieta Goemon no Nazo!!
description:
Puzzle video game developed and published by Konami on March 29, 1996 in Japan for the Super Famicom gaming console.

It is a spin-off of the Ganbare Goemon series, where the player must guide Ebisumaru through a number of labyrinths presented in an isometric perspective, while also avoiding enemies and falling into pits.
